Application_Code.title: Application_Code
Application_Code.description:
Format: 5 digit number, found on the Application record Application_Code__c field
This is the unique identifier of the Application record

Email.title: Email
Email.description:
Format: Email
This is the Email Address the Candidate typed when they started their chat. This is the unique identifier if the Candidate record

QuestionsAndAnswers.title: QuestionsAndAnswers
QuestionsAndAnswers.description:
These are the Questions asked by you from the Job Spec Record from the Questions to ask field and answers by the Candidate for these questions specifically
Number the Question, and bullet the answers
